title: r/nosleeep needs moderators and is currently available for request
author: request_bot
text: If you're interested and willing to moderate and grow this community, 		please go to r/redditrequest, where you can submit a request to take 		over the community. Be sure to [read through the faq](https://www.reddit.com/r/redditrequest/wiki/faq) 		for r/redditrequest before submitting.
